org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render

Class BorderRenderer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render.AbstractRenderer<T>
      • org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render.BorderRenderer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of image to draw into
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectedComponentProcessor

    public class BorderRenderer<T>
extends AbstractRenderer<T>
    Draws the border of the connected component into the given image.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render.AbstractRenderer

      BorderRenderer(Image<T,?> image, T colour, ConnectedComponent.ConnectMode mode)
      Default constructor that takes the image to draw into, the colour to draw the boundary and the connect mode to use to extract the boundary.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorderRenderer

        public BorderRenderer(Image<T,?> image,
              T colour,
              ConnectedComponent.ConnectMode mode)
        Default constructor that takes the image to draw into, the colour to draw the boundary and the connect mode to use to extract the boundary.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to draw into.
        colour - The colour to use to draw the boundary
        mode - The ConnectedComponent.ConnectMode to use to extract the boundary.

      • BorderRenderer

        public BorderRenderer(int width,
              int height,
              T colour,
              ConnectedComponent.ConnectMode mode)
        Constructor that creates the image to draw into, and takes the colour to draw the boundary and the connect mode to use to extract the boundary.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the image to create
        height - The height of the image to create
        colour - The colour to use to draw the boundary
        mode - The ConnectedComponent.ConnectMode to use to extract the boundary.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(ConnectedComponent cc)
        Draws the boundary of the connected component into the image. Perform an operation on the given ConnectedComponent.
        Parameters:
        cc - The ConnectedComponent to process.
